name: hiven
description: Hiven.js - TS/JS bot library for Hiven

scripts.push: yarn build; cp -R package.json README.md LICENSE dist; (cd dist && yarn publish); rm -rf dist/package.json dist/README.md dist/LICENSE
scripts.lnk: yarn build; cp -R package.json README.md LICENSE dist; (cd dist && yarn link)

author: Dustin Rouillard <code@dustin.sh> (https://dustin.sh)
